RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported endpoints per interface for All Classes

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported endpoints per interface

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported endpoints per interface

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_INTERFACES
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Interfaces

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_INTERFACES
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Interfaces

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_INTERFACES
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Interfaces

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_INTERFACES
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Interfaces

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_SUPPORTED_CLASS
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Classes

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_SUPPORTED_CLASS
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Classes

RefParameter.Name: USBH_USE_OS
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_USE_OS (Enable the support of an RTOS)
RefParameter.Description: Enable RTOS support

RefParameter.Name: USBH_USE_OS
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_USE_OS (Enable the support of an RTOS)
RefParameter.Description: Enable RTOS support

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
only one possible value as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 1

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
Two possible values as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 2

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
Three possible values as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 3

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
Four possible values as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 4

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
Five possible values as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 5

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
Six possible values as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS equals to 6

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)
RefParameter.Description:
The osPriority value specifies the priority for a thread.
Note:
All values are available as configMAX_PRIORITIES in FreeRTOS is >= 7

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_PRIO (The CMSIS-RTOS osPriority value specifies the priority for the USB Host thread)

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_STACK_SIZE
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_STACK_SIZE (The CMSIS-RTOS stack size requirements in words)
RefParameter.Description:
Stack size used by the main USB Host thread.
It's up to the user to fine tune this parameter value considering all dependencies.

RefParameter.Name: USBH_PROCESS_STACK_SIZE
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_PROCESS_STACK_SIZE (The CMSIS-RTOS stack size requirements in words)
RefParameter.Description:
Stack size used by the main USB Host thread.
It's up to the user to fine tune this parameter value considering all dependencies.

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_NUM_CONFIGURATION
RefParameter.Description: Maximum number of supported Configurations

RefParameter.Name: USBH_KEEP_CFG_DESCRIPTOR
RefParameter.Description: Allow to keep full configuration descriptor in RAM when further parsing is needed

RefParameter.Name: USBH_KEEP_CFG_DESCRIPTOR
RefParameter.Description: Allow to keep full configuration descriptor in RAM when further parsing is needed

RefParameter.Name: USBH_KEEP_CFG_DESCRIPTOR
RefParameter.Description: Allow to keep full configuration descriptor in RAM when further parsing is needed

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_SIZE_CONFIGURATION
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_MAX_SIZE_CONFIGURATION (Maximun size in bytes for the Configuration Descriptor)
RefParameter.Description: Maximum size of configuration descriptor

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_SIZE_CONFIGURATION
RefParameter.Comment: USBH_MAX_SIZE_CONFIGURATION (Maximun size in bytes for the Configuration Descriptor)
RefParameter.Description: Maximum size of configuration descriptor

RefParameter.Name: USBH_MAX_DATA_BUFFER
RefParameter.Description: Maximum size for USB descriptor container

RefParameter.Name: USBH_DEBUG_LEVEL

PossibleValue.Comment: 3: All messages and internal debug messages are shown

RefParameter.Description:
Define different level output trace as folowing :
0 : No debug message is shown
1 : only User message are shown
2 : User + Error messages are shown
3 : All message and interal debug message are shown
